BBEX3.M.TMM.EUR.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the euro in Turkmenistan / EUR 1 = TMM ... (middle)
General: Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 2009 at the rate of TMM 5,000 = TMT 1; for exchange rates as of 2009, see BBEX3:M:TMT:EUR:CA:AC:A01.
Source: Central Bank of Turkmenistan, Ashgabat.
Comment on 2008-01: On 1 January 2008, the fixed exchange rate with the US dollar was changed from USD 1 = TMM 5,200 to USD 1 = TMM 6,250; calculated devaluation: 16.8%.
Comment on 2008-05: On 1 May 2008, the fixed exchange rate with the US dollar was changed from USD 1 = TMM 6,250 to USD 1 = TMM 14,250; calculated devaluation: 56,1%.
Comment on 2008-12: Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 2009 at the rate of TMM 5,000 = TMT 1.
